content.question: Which of the following best describes the value assigned to  count  as a result of executing the code segment?

choices.label: The number of elements in  words  whose length is the same length as the first element
The number of elements in  words  whose length is the same length as the element immediately preceding it
The number of elements in  words  whose value is equal to the first element
The number of elements in  words  whose value is equal to the element immediately preceding it

content.answer: The number of elements in  words  whose length is the same length as the element immediately preceding it

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
